text:
Bug 58293 was caused by calling a ctor that expects a String varags (...) parameter with a null String. 

This gets converted by the compiler to String[]{null} rather than (String[]) null. The null arg in the array then caused a problem.

We need to check the code for any other such possible problems.
creator: sebb@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text:
I did a quick check and could only find one other example:
MenuScroller.MenuIcon.MenuIcon(int... yPoints)

This does not appear to be a problem as it is part of an enum

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
@sebb, Can this one be closed ?
Thanks
